item.title: Active tugboat between the US and Israel while the slaughter continues - KKE (M -L) (KKE m l)
item.description: We have now entered the sixth month of the Genocystic slaughter of the Zionist state of Israel against the people of Palestine in the Gaza Strip. The unstoppable daily bombings turn the area into ruins full of murdered civilians, while the Israeli war council was approved and the invasion of Rafa.

item.title: Chaco Neighbors and deputies united by the Food Emergency (Partido Comunista Revolucionario)
item.description: The activity was carried out in conjunction with the community and deputies of the Chaco Front, where legislators Pía Chiacchio Cavanna and Rodolfo Schwartz proposed to discuss the project of their authorship, of Law No. 448/24

item.title: To give way through the mass struggle! - KKE (M-L) (KKE m l)
item.description: European Council President Charles Michelle proclaims that "if he wants peace, Europe needs to be prepared for war" and that we need to "go into war economy" while at the same time, the long -haired delusions and lies for lies for lies. The "Europe of the Peoples" are re -employed by the rulers to drag their peoples to the upcoming electoral farce.

item.title: The culprits continue the concealment business - KKE (M -L) (KKE m l)
item.description: On the issue of Tempi, the government wants to achieve two, conflicting, goals: to conceal the crime, but also to calm the anger of both relatives and people. And the pie and the dog grass, that is.

item.title: Medicine for all the disease ... the people pay the marble - KKE (M -L) (KKE m l)
item.description: The continuity and intensity of policy that will ruin labor rights for health care and the right of the people to free and equal to all care is a given. What we should constantly concern to us is how to build resistance on the part of the popular forces in the direction of getting a barrier to this policy.

item.title: Outside Greece from the EU! - From the European elections! - KKE (M-L) (KKE m l)
item.description: From its initial phase and throughout its journey to its present form, the EU has been and exists as a venture of Europe's imperialists. It is a coalition to serve and promote interests and aspirations before all its imperialist pillars.

item.title: How many certifications make a high school graduate? - KKE (M-L) (KKE m l)
item.description: Students' resistance in order not to pass the new measures and to overthrow all anti -populist laws in education is a necessity. Through their 5 -member and 15 -member trade unions, with weapons of general assemblies, occupations and demonstrations, they must make decisions to continue the fight!

item.title: The intensity of repression cannot "persuade" the youth to submit - KKE (M -L) (KKE m l)
item.description: The invasion of Police Forces at the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki at the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki at noon on Saturday 16/3 to evacuate the occupations that were held in sections and the arrest of 49 students is a serious example of the system's revanchism.

item.title: Kiev in despair, Europe in confusion, Putin… reinforced - KKE (M -L) (KKE m l)
item.description: Ukraine's possible defeat will highlight the weaknesses of Western mechanisms. And this is something that exacerbates a sense of strategic impasse, especially for European imperialists.

item.title: RJ: Manifestation requires end of lawsuit against motorcycle taxi drivers unfairly accused (see video) - the new democracy (A Nova Democracia)
item.description: On March 20, a demonstration required the end of the lawsuit against Diego Felipe, motorcycle taxi driver and maqueiro at the UFRJ Hospital. He is accused by the PM of transporting a dismantled rifle, which was with a passenger transported by the worker.

item.title: Brazil: The 23 persecuted activists from 2013/14 were acquitted – The Red Herald (Red Herald)
item.description: A Nova Democracia reports that on Tuesday, March 19, the trial of the request for acquittal of the 23 political activists persecuted for their participation in the 2013 and 2014 demonstrations took place at the Court in Rio de Janeiro.

item.title: Nigeria: The Wrath of the Masses – The Red Herald (Red Herald)
item.description: On Thursday, last week, a dispute on land between people from Okuama, Ughelli South, and Okoloba, Bomadi, in Nigeria's southern state of Delta, took place. The armed forces of the old State tried to intervene but received what they did not expect.

item.title: War-torn Sudan heading for disaster – The Red Herald (Red Herald)
item.description: We have previously reported on the war in Sudan portraying an initial analysis of the circumstances of the outbreak of the war.

item.title: Again short -time work ... (DIE ROTE FAHNE)
item.description: (Correspondence from the company) At the end of December, we received the announcement that the company leave is extended due to the poor order situation and that short-time work will be registered again in 2024. at the expense of the workers! Now we should be registered for a year for short -time work, which means that we are now getting ten percent less wages.

item.title: 25 years of NATO attack on Yugoslavia (DIE ROTE FAHNE)
item.description: On March 24th, the NATO bomb attack on Yugoslavia marks the 25th anniversary. The bloody attack on the right of self -determination of the peoples in the Balkans still draws its consequences. The military alliance bombed for 78 days and nights, between 12,000 and 15,000 people were killed. Austrian capital still benefits from the Yugoslavia War today. NATO bombs for "peace promotion"? The Yugoslavia war led to a deep split within the peoples in the Balkans. Under the before

item.title: Crimes of Israel – The Red Herald (Red Herald)
item.description: In the International Military Tribunal, know as the Nuremberg trial, the Soviet Union together with Yankee, British and French imperialism tried crimes of the European Axis, mainly by the Nazis.

item.title: Denmark: The “IUD Campaign” and the social engineering of Danish colonialism in Greenland – The Red Herald (Red Herald)
item.description: Thousands of Greenlandic women were involuntarily implanted with IUDs to prevent them from becoming pregnant in the 1960s-1970s by the Danish colonial authorities. This was done to reduce population growth in Greenland - a cruel and cynical expression of population control as part of Danish imperialism's colonial policy in Greenland.

item.title: US to build “all-encompassing” spy satellite network – The Red Herald (Red Herald)
item.description: SpaceX is building network of spy satellites called ”Starshield” under a classified contract with the US government. SpaceX has a $1.8 billion contract with the National Reconnaissance Office (NRO), which includes personnel from the CIA and the Space Forces, to build a network of satellites able to quickly single out military targets almost anywhere in the world to support the ground forces of US imperialism.

item.title: The peasants took the water sources back from a large farm after hitting the gunmen in a clash (Uusi Brasilia)
item.description: Approximately 100 farmers organized by the Poor Peasant Association Jaqueira (Pernambuco) from various communities took back their water source, which had been fenced by a large farmer company. 18.…

item.description: The community has over 200 years of existence, with lands passed from generation to generation, in which residents work in the fields for their subsistence.

item.title: Oaxaca without water, drought or looting? – The Red Herald (Red Herald)
item.description: During the last few months, more than 4,326 hectares of land were affected by terrible forest fires caused by the latifundium or surged as a phenomenon during the dry season.

item.title: Ecuador: PALO QUEMADO-LAS PAMPAS RESISTS AGAINST MINING IMPERIALISM – The Red Herald (Red Herald)
item.description: The imperialist boots, of a different stripe, invade Ecuador, hunting for our land, natural resources, cheap labor, market (mainly arms), colluding and struggling for the distribution of the world.

item.title: XANTHI From the presentation of the book "200+1 years after" (Resistance in the neighbourhood)
India: Clashes between the Peasantry and the old State continue – The Red Herald (Red Herald)
item.description: This last week new clashes have erupted between the old Indian State and the peasants. The struggle of these last ones, far away from being a specific phenomenon in Punjab-Haryana, is a constant struggle in the whole country, between the peasantry and the old bureaucratic-big landlord Indian State.

item.title: On the current situation in Haiti – The Red Herald (Red Herald)
item.description: Recently it has been reported that all the political groups and parties have agreed to be part of the Transitional Council, which will propose new candidates and will elect a new interim prime minister to rule Haiti. The only party that refused to participate was the Pitit Desalin Party.
